urls.description: Abstract. Mutagenic ribonucleosides can act as broad-based antiviral agents. They are metabolized to the active ribonucleoside triphosphate form and concentrate

urls.description: – gestützt auf Artikel 143 seiner Geschäftsordnung, A. in der Erwägung, dass die Europäische Arzneimittel-Agentur bereits rund eine Million Fälle von Nebenwirkungen nach der Impfung mit COVID-19-Impfstoffen aufführt: – 435 779 Fälle beim Impfstoff von Pfizer BioNTech, – 373 285 Fälle beim Impfstoff von AstraZeneca, – 117 243 Fälle beim Impfstoff von Moderna, B. in der Erwägung, dass diese Nebenwirkungen mitunter schwerwiegend ausfallen; in der Erwägung, dass beispielsweise etwa 75 000 Personen nach der

urls.title: Le molnupiravir ravive l’espoir d’un traitement simple et efficace contre le Covid-19
urls.description: Le laboratoire affirme que son médicament, le molnupiravir, réduirait de 50 % le risque d’hospitalisation ou de mort du Covid-19. Il va demander «dès que possible» une autorisation d’utilisation d’urgence aux Etats-Unis.

@EMA_News @EU_Health @ECDC_EU Hopefully update on Novavax ... EMA is very silent about this
#Novavax has submitted data on manufacturing. This will allow us to progress in the review of this vaccine. A possible approval is expected in the coming months. #EMAPresser #COVID19vaccines
@EMA_News @john_mcguirk, you were asking about the Moderna (Spikevax) booster. 👆

#Comirnaty for children aged 5 to 11: conclusion expected in December. This is a shortened timetable compared to similar reviews. We will also consider further data collected and submitted by BioNTech/Pfizer from an ongoing paediatric trial. #EMAPresser

#COVID19vaccine Janssen: We expect data on #boosterdose administered 6 months after the 1st dose. In parallel we will consider data from a clinical trial that investigated if a schedule of 2 doses increases protection compared to the one dose schedule. #EMAPresser

Most Member States started administering #boosterdoses to people more at risk of #coronavirus infection and transmission. Expansion of booster doses to general population may be the next step. #EMAPresser

We are seeing promising results from studies confirming a stronger immune response when the #COVID19vaccine given as a 2nd or 3rd dose is different to the vaccine that was initially received. We continue to collect and look into data on heterologous vaccination. #EMAPresser
Over the coming weeks, we will receive data on the #Janssen booster given 6 months after the 1st dose. #EMAPresser
An EMA conclusion on a booster dose of #Spikevax in people over 12 years of age, 6 months after the second dose, is expected on 25 October. We will communicate the outcome. #EMAPresser

We are seeing data on the use of #Spikevax, the #COVID19vaccine developed by Moderna, in young children. We are discussing timelines of application with the developer to extend the use of this vaccine to children in the future. #EMAPresser
